paper_abstract: In this paper, we strengthen two recent undecidability results about weighted timed automata, an extension of timed automata with cost variables. More precisely, we propose new encodings of a Minsky machine. that only require three clocks and one stopwatch cost, while previous reductions required five clocks and one stopwatch cost. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Improved undecidability results on weighted timed automata
